member.summary: Inteface to send/recive messages over a transport.

member.name: P:FIX4NET.IEngine.MsgSeqNumInRecover
member.summary: MsgSeqNum for incoming messages after recovery is complete. This only get update when opening the cache.

member.name: P:FIX4NET.IEngine.MsgSeqNumOutRecover
member.summary: MsgSeqNum for outgoing messages after recovery is complete. This only get update when opening the cache.

member.summary: Add a message.

member.summary: Get current MsgSeqNum by MessageDirection. This updates in real-time as messages are added.

member.summary: Initialize the cache.

member.summary: Current MsgIndex for messages. This updates in real-time as messages are added.
